import*as types from'./../constants/ActionTypes';var initialState={by:'name',value:1// 1: Tang, -1 giam
};var myReducer=function myReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.SORT:return{by:action.sort.by,value:action.sort.value};default:return state;}return state;};export default myReducer;
